name: Bungee Jumping
desc: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush as you leap off a towering platform in breathtaking locations.

name: Trekking
desc: Embark on scenic trails, explore rugged terrains, and connect with nature on unforgettable trekking adventures.

name: Bungee Jumping
desc: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush as you leap off a towering platform in breathtaking locations.

name: Trekking
desc: Embark on scenic trails, explore rugged terrains, and connect with nature on unforgettable trekking adventures.

name: Scuba Diving
desc: Dive into crystal-clear waters to explore vibrant marine life and mesmerizing underwater landscapes.

name: Waterfall Rappelling
desc: Conquer cascading waterfalls while rappelling down with an exhilarating mix of adventure and nature.

name: Wildlife Safari
desc: Discover exotic wildlife, stunning landscapes, and thrilling encounters in their natural habitats.

name: Cycling
desc: Ride through picturesque trails, serene countryside, and challenging mountain paths on a cycling escapade.

name: Paragliding
desc: Soar like a bird and enjoy panoramic views of valleys, mountains, and coasts with paragliding adventures.

name: Forest Camping
desc: Immerse in the tranquility of nature with night camping under a starlit sky in lush forests.
